website_summaries.verdict: Despite our fit issues, the Jabra Extreme's advanced features, excellent noise-cancellation, and affordable price tag make it a great Bluetooth headset.
pros: The Jabra Extreme's features include multipoint technology and A2DP compatibility
It has a dedicated power switch, and the call quality is excellent
cons: The Jabra Extreme has small volume controls, and it didn't feel very comfortable in the ear

customer_reviews.title: Why bother?
customer_reviews.text: This is the last over-priced big-name ear piece I am buying. To be fair, sound quality is excellent in my ear, but others complain they cannot hear me well...even when I am sitting inside my home office. Fit is not very comfortable, but not the worst either. Battery life is brutal - device claims a talk time of six hours but starts to go low after two+. Find myself charging it more than any other earpiece I have ever had. Amazon seems to have a ton of sub-$30 earpieces that claim the same benefits as this higher-priced Jabra - how much worse can they be? Why pay twice the price for what is likely the same mediocre quality?
customer_reviews.author: Steve792

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped operating properly one month after purchase. One start up it stop saying connected and just make an telephone error type sound. Soon after battery life got shorter & shorter. This unit was mildly used on a day to day basis. Unit would lose charge by late afternoon; this is after a full night of charging. Had to revert back to my previous headset/earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Yancey Netter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I lost my original Jabra Extreme so I bought this refurbished replacement. It was a great price and arrived quickly. It works perfectly...and of course, shortly after it arrived I found the "lost" one, so now I have two. Not sorry I got it though.
customer_reviews.author: DP in the SE

customer_reviews.title: I've had about 6 of these, and used them ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had about 6 of these, and used them all to death, or until I lost them. Very solid and generally reliable. If I remember right, these weren't actually in retail packaging but the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Poor Battery Life unlike my previous I used and lost It in a motor accident !
customer_reviews.author: George Cobbah

customer_reviews.title: jawbone extreme 2
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth, A little static at times but it might have been my phone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love when I receive a phone call because instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, finally I can listen to Pandora through a Bluetooth. I got me and my husband one. No complaints. I love when I receive a phone call because instead of having to open my phone it actually tells me the number calling me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would have came in the packaging like the description said
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would have came in the packaging like the description said, not just plastic baggies. Normally wouldn't care but I was giving it as a present. It did ship fast, and I have not heard from the person I gave it to as to how it works yet. I am assuming there is no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: tara robinson

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see a update that will make this have ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it had voice commands but found out after that it didn't. Would like to see a update that will make this have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Simple, easy to use. Quick and solid automatic connection
customer_reviews.author: Drew Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Jabra Extreme and they are good products.
customer_reviews.author: Angee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good..
customer_reviews.text: It is been working fairly well. Every once in a while I get a little glitch in the earpiece, but it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best Bluetooth I ever bought,sound if very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Poor service
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong color item and no charger for it. It did not give me options to return item.
customer_reviews.author: marley landes

customer_reviews.title: Its the only one he will use now and it has good voice for the person he talking to
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this Bluetooth. Its the only one he will use now and it has good voice for the person he talking to, can't hear all of the background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I know who is CALLING
customer_reviews.text: Love my Bluetooth, the caller ID is the feature that made me purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Helen R Turner

customer_reviews.title: Clear reception
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is quite good. Those of us that wear hearing aid could use a little more volume since it doesn't fit tight in the ear. Good battery life and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: REM

product_meta.title: Jabra EXTREME2 Bluetooth Headset - Retail Packaging - Black/Silver
product_meta.description: Talk freely in any environmentExtreme noise cancellation in Jabra Extreme2 blocks out an astonishing amount of background noise so it drowns out everything but your voice. At the same time HD Voice* adjusts the volume to your environment automatically, so no matter where you are you can hear above the noise. No more fumbling with the headset You can effortlessly control your Jabra Extreme2 with your hands free by giving it simple commands to answer or reject a call. But it talks to you too, guiding you through pairing with devices, who is calling or how soon it needs recharging. *Device and network dependent
feature_bullets: Extreme noise cancellation with Noise Blackout 3.0 dual microphone technology for exceptional call quality
Manage your headset and calls with Voice Control
Up to 5.5 hours talk time and up to 10.5 days standby time
Pair it with two Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as a mobile phone, tablet or MP3 player ,HD Voice , for better sound quality of both ends of the call

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
